semantic_identifier: 111: fix: Recompute scenario forecasts on coverage/hiring input changes + regression test

sections.text:
## Description

This PR fixes an issue where edits to scenario modeling inputs (pipeline coverage targets and hiring capacity) did not reliably trigger a full forecast recompute, leaving totals, deltas, and segment breakdowns stale.

Implementation details:
- Normalized update flow so changes to coverage targets and hiring capacity both dispatch through a single “scenario inputs changed” path.
- Added explicit invalidation of cached/derived scenario outputs and triggered a full recomputation of the scenario model on each relevant input change.
- Ensured the recompute result is the sole source for dependent UI values (totals, deltas, per-segment breakdowns) to prevent partial/stale renders.
- Kept changes scoped to scenario modeling recalculation and UI refresh behavior (no schema/API changes).

Testing:
- Added a lightweight regression test that simulates changing coverage targets and hiring capacity and asserts that forecast projections (totals and segment values) update on every change.

## How Has This Been Tested?

staging
